Description: String of 18 stone beads, of which three large oblate oval rock crystal ones, nine small globular cornelian ones, six globular to faceted truncated bicone ones of chalcedony or quartz.
Curator's comments: On stone beads, see W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 79 § 79
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 79 § 79)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.85, p.187, pl.29)
Exhibition history: 2023 Mar - Sep, France, Paris, Musee du Cluny, Journery through Rock Crystal
